uac.timeout.watchdog.tooltip: Timeout in ms for the 'Watchdog Read'. If the response of the 'Watchdog Read' does not return within the 'Watchdog Timeout', the OPC UA Client assumes that the connection to the OPC UA Server was interrupted or closed
